entry.title: How Building Affordable Rental Housing Works in Oregon
entry.summary: Communities across Oregon need more affordable rental housing options. Many of our neighbors, including families, older adults on fixed incomes, and even people with steady jobs, struggle to find affordable places to live. entry.title: New e-bike rules begin at Oregon State Parks and the ocean shore
entry.summary: SALEM, Oregon—Electric-assist bicycles (e-bikes) are now allowed on trails where other bicycles are allowed unless specifically prohibited at Oregon State Parks. E-bikes are also allowed on the ocean shore on wet sand except where specifically restricted. Previously, e-bikes were only allowed on trails that were at least 8 feet wide. Signs will be posted on… The post New e-bike rules begin at Oregon State Parks and the ocean shore appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.
